Class JarDistillerJFrame

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      jpo.JarDistillerJFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
Deprecated. This is not peoperly thought through and should not be used.

class JarDistillerJFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Creates a GUI that allows the export of a subtree to a Jar file. This is not properly thought through and is currently diabled.
